summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessments on that portion of lot 1, block 30, Baltimore Addition to the City of Seattle, deeded to the City of Seattle, for street purposes, levied for the improvement of Northlake Avenue et al, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, as provided for by Ordinance No. 12496 creating Local Improvement District No. 1097.
